did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: United Hospital Fund of New York records, 1920-1935.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: United Hospital Fund of New York.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes minutes of meetings, memoranda, correspondence, plans, reports, and financial records of the fund raising organization for New York City hospitals.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes minutes of meetings, memoranda, correspondence, plans, reports, and financial records of the fund raising organization for New York City hospitals.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United Hospital Fund of New York.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: United Hospital Fund of New York records, #3003. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Minutes of the Luncheon Meeting on Dispensaries
Special Meeting of the Trustees of the United Hospital Fund of New York
Memorandum to the Committee by Michael M. Davis Jr. on Aims and Program of Proposed Undertaking
Letter to the Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. (Exec. Sec.)
Letter to Edwin R. Embree, Sec. Rockefeller Foundation (enclosed with Memorandum of Nov. 23)
Memorandum to the Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. (including Budget figures for 1921 and related notes)
Minutes of Meeting (and Resolution concerning fund of $500.00)

Memorandum to the Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. (with enclosure, "Demonstration program...Mount Sinai Hospital" and copy of letter to Dr. Louis I. Dublin, of Metropolitan Life Insurance Company)
Memorandum to the Sub-Committee on District Dispensary Demonstration from Michael M. Davis, Jr.
Minutes of the Meeting on the Sub-Committee on Dist. Disp. Dem.
Copy of Letter to William M. Sloane, Pres. Presbyterian Hospital from John Sherman Hoyt
Memorandum to the Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr.
Memorandum to the Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr., (A) District Dispensary Demonstration and (B) Proposed Relationship between Committee and Hospital Social Service Association
Minutes of Special Meeting (and enclosure of memorandum of Feb. 10 from M.M. Davis, Jr.)
Letter to John Sherman Hoyt from Robert W. Carle Chairman, Out-Patient Dept. of The Presbyterian Hospital)
Carbon copy of sheet showing Daily Average of New and Old patients at Cornell University Medical College Dispensary, Jan. 1921
Minutes of Medical Sub-Committee on Dispensary Development
Memorandum from Michael M. Davis, Jr. to Dean of Cornell Medical School re Tentative Plan for a Cooperative Clinic
Suggested Plan - Development of Health Center Work in New York City, by Anna M. Richardson
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re District Dispensary Demonstaration
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re administrator for our Pay Clinic Demonstration at Cornell
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re Report of the Presbyterian Demonstration
Memorandum from Michael M. Davis, Jr. to Committee re meeting of Oct. 28
Excerpt from the report of Exec. Sec. to the Committee
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. and propsed Budget for 1922
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re Committee Meetings
Memorandum to Committee re Special Meeting on Feb. 9
Memorandum for meeting with the Dispensary Development Committee
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. enclosing Annual Report for Sept. 1920-Jan. 1922, also Report of District Dispensary Demonstration
Memorandum re meeting of Medical Sub-Committee
Memorandum of above Meeting which was held Mar. 16
Memorandum from Exec. Sec. to Committee re Medical Sub-Committee
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re training of Dispensary personnel
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. to Medical Sub-Committee re general aide or assistant
Outline of Educational Program (typescript carbon copy)
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr, re Presbyterian Demonstration and Publicity Program
Letter (carbon copy) to Edwin R. Embree, Rockefeller Foundation from Michael M. Davis, Jr.
Exhibits A, B, and C of Cornell Clinic Attendance, Nov. 1, 1921-Sept. 30, 1922, and financial statement re Cornell Clinic
Memorandum to Committee from MMD re Policy of Committee's work next year with tentative budget
Report on probable reorganization of the Presbyterian O.P.D.
Minutes of Meeting (also outline "Statistical Bureau attached to the Associated Out-Patient Clinics" Jan. 23, 1923)
Confidential Report to the Committee regarding the Presbyterian Program
Minutes of Meeting (including report on divisions of work, etc.; Pending subjects for research and report; Finances)
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re Budget for 1924
Carbon copy of letter from Edwin R. Embree to Mr. Fisher re grant of $145,000 from Rockefeller Foundation
Minutes of Meeting (with carbon copy of Annual Report, Jan. 1, 1923-Dec. 1, 1923)
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re "Unloading Program"
Memorandum to Sub-Committee on the Presbyterian Hosptial re Report on Presbyterian Program
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re June 24 meeting
"Opinions of the physicians at recent conference regarding committee policy" (typescript initialled MMD)
Copy of letter from Alfred E. Shipley, M.D. (Chairman Public Health Committee) to Michael M. Davis, Jr.
Exhibit 'A' of report to Rockefeller Foundation - COMMITTEE ON THE DISPENSARY DEVELOPMENT OF THE UNITED HOSPITAL FUND OF NEW YORK
Exhibit 'B' of report to Rockefeller Foundation - "Report to the Committee on Dispensary Development by the Executive Secretary on (1) Status of Work and (2) Future Plans" (21 pp typescript)
Memorandum from the Rockefeller Committee from the Committee Request for Appropriation for 1925 and Suggestions of Future Program
Minutes of Meeting (and Revision of Budget for 1925)
Copy of Letter from Henry J. Fisher to Committee
Letter to Executive Committee from Henry J. Fisher etc.
Letter to Rockefeller Foundation from the Committee (signed by Henry J. Fisher) on future needs; also sheet showing Net Annual Expenditures, 1921-1924 and Budgets, 1925-1926
Memorandum to Committee from Michael M. Davis, Jr. re Terminal Program (including 2 charts) - 1) The Clinic Field in New York City, 2) Needs and Activities of the Clinic Field in New York City
Minutes of Meeting (including Tentative Budget for 1926)
Minutes of the first meeting of the Committee in charge
Minutes of the committee (Adv. Comm. on Prob. of Hosp. Adm.)
Minutes of the committee (Hosp. Inf. and Service Bureau)
Minutes of the committee (Hosp. Inf. and Service Bureau Comm.)
The Hospital Survey for New York, Vol. I, by Haven Emerson, M.D. United Hosptial Fund, NY.
Health and Employment, by Lucille Spellman. Thesis, University of Minnesota.
Two Studies of the Social Aspects of Health Problems of Public Relief Clients. Committee of Medical Care in Community Health of The American Association of Medical Social Workers.
A Tradition of Service. United Hospital Fund of New York.
The Use of Convelescent Care Facilities. United Hospital Fund of New York.
The Background to Current Thinking and Problems in Convelescent Care, by Lester Peddy.
The Effects of Separation on Children Treated for Asthma by Samuel Kaminsky.
